name: Hanno
description:
A puzzle game, but also a test demo of basic Unity 2d development. Hanno was one of history's first explorers; take on the role of an early explorer on the open sea. Discover exotic islands, immense sea monsters, and whirlpools that might lead to another world, or time.

Along the way, you may encounter a man-made sea monster; the Trash Gyre. Try your best to defeat this terrible monstrosity.
